nodes.text: Avery Linnix was a male art dealer who lived and worked on the planet Procopia in the Tapani sector during the Galactic Civil War between the Alliance to Restore the Republic and the Galactic Empire. On Procopia, he maintained a shop in an exclusive area of the Commercial District on Estalle Island. As well as the objects available in his shop, Linnix also secretly dealt in stolen unique and well-known works of art, with his main clients being Tapani Nobles who wanted the pieces for their private collections. Linnix was a Rebel sympathizer and occasionally provided Rebel cells within the Tapani sector with funding, also allowing them use of his smuggling pipelines to transport small items.

Avery Linnix first appeared as a possible ally for Rebel heroes in the campaign guide included in Lords of the Expanse, a 1997 supplement to Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game by West End Games. The supplement was written by Paul Sudlow and Chris Doyle, and did not clarify Linnix's species.
